mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_video_report_base (REPORT_ID, CAT_NAME, REPORT_CONTENT, ADD_TIME, CUST_ID, CUSTED_ID, CUST_PHONE, VIDEO_NO, REPORT_FLAG, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{reportId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{custedId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{custPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{videoNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dcdg_video_report_base set CAT_NAME = #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_CONTENT = #{reportContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUSTED_ID = #{custedId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUST_PHONE = #{custPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, VIDEO_NO = #{videoNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPORT_FLAG = #{reportFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REPORT_ID = #{reportId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select REPORT_ID, CAT_NAME, REPORT_CONTENT, ADD_TIME, CUST_ID, CUSTED_ID, CUST_PHONE, VIDEO_NO, REPORT_FLAG, UPDATE_TIME from dcdg_video_report_base where REPORT_ID = #{reportId,jdbcType=CHAR}
